description.value: You quickly use your momentum to topple and spring off of foes. You can use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Wall Jump] to make additional jumps off of creatures larger than you as if they were walls. Once per turn when you make an additional jump off of a creature in this way, you can also attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Shove] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Trip] that creature as a free action.

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse
